sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Overview } from "../OverviewComponent"; import { OverviewTemplate } from "../OverviewText"; export const API = props => { const { type, view, name, color } = props; const optionalText = ( <> The Menu API includes three stateless React components:{" "} Menu, MenuItem, MenuDivider. 
        import MenuItem from "../../core/Menu/MenuItem"; 

        import MenuDivider from "../../core/Menu/MenuDivider";
To add a submenu to a Menu, simply nest MenuItem's within another{" "} MenuItem. The submenu opens to the right of it's parent by default, but will adjust and flip to the left if there is not enough room to the right.
MenuItem API look at the API tab. Menu & MenuDivider{" "} components API contains only type, view, color props. Type & View props can be omitted.
MenuDivider API additional contains title - an optional header title (string). ); /**Overview */ const OverviewText = ; /**API */ const APIData = [ { prop: "type", type: ( <> string = def ), desc: ( <> This prop set the shape of the component. Possible states:{" "} def . The default state is def. ) }, { prop: "view", type: ( <> string = smooth ), desc: ( <> This prop set the view of the component. Possible states:{" "} smooth . The default state is smooth. ) }, { prop: "color", type: ( <> string = default ), desc: ( <> This prop set the color of the component. Possible states: default | primary | warning | danger | success | primary_alt | warning_alt | danger_alt | success_alt . The default state is default. ) }, { prop: "className", type: <>string, desc: "A space-delimited list of class names to pass along to a child element." }, { prop: "text", type: <>string, desc: <>An Item text, required for usability. }, { prop: "disabled", type: <>boolean, desc: <>Whether this menu item is non-interactive. }, { prop: "href", type: <>string, desc: <>A Link URL. }, { prop: "target", type: <>string, desc: <>Link target attribute. Use "_blank" to open in a new window. }, { prop: "icon", type: <>string | element, desc: ( <> Name of a Blueprint UI icon (or an icon element) to render before the text. ) }, { prop: "label", type: <>string, desc: ( <>Right-aligned label text content, useful for displaying hotkeys. ) }, { prop: "labelElement", type: <>element, desc: "Right-aligned label content, useful for displaying hotkeys. For example, labelElement={}" }, { prop: "onClick", type: <>func, desc: <>Click event handler }, { prop: "children", type: <>array, desc: ( <> Children of this component will be rendered in a submenu that appears when hovering or clicking on this menu item. ) } ]; /** Code source */ const Code = `/*** DEMO #1 ***/ <Menu type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" > <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="cog" text="Custom SVG icon" label="Label" /> <MenuDivider type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}"> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="import" text="Import tasks" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="notifications" text="Email notifications" labelElement={4} /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="success" icon="tick-circle" text="Save as template" labelElement={<Icon icon="new-link" />} /> <MenuDivider type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}"> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="danger" icon="cog" text="Settings..." labelElement={<Icon icon="share" />} /> </Menu> /*** DEMO #2 ***/ <Menu type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" > <MenuDivider title="Edit" type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}"> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="cut" text="Cut" labelElement="⌘X" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="copy" text="Copy" labelElement="⌘C" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="paste" text="Paste" labelElement="⌘V" disabled={true} /> <MenuDivider title="Text" type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}"> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="align-left" text="Alignment" > <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="align-left" text="Left" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="align-center" text="Center" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="align-right" text="Right" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="align-justify" text="Justify" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="style" text="Style" > <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="bold" text="Bold" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="italic" text="Italic" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="underline" text="Underline" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="asterisk" text="Miscellaneous" > <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="briefcase" text="Briefcase" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="calculator" text="Calculator" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="dollar" text="Dollar" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="success" icon="full-circle" text="Success Circle" > <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="danger" icon="heart" text="Danger Heart" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="warning" icon="ring" text="Warning Ring" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="dollar" text="Dollar" /> <MenuItem type="${type}" view="${view}" color="${color}" icon="dot" text="Shapes" > </MenuItem> </MenuItem> </Menu> `; return ; };
